Q1. Have you ever been a victim of fraud? (Please note, this could be any type of fraud - such as text scams, romance fraud, cold calling, identity theft, investment fraud, etc.)
Q1b. Did you lose any money when you were a victim of fraud?
Q2. What type of fraud were you a victim of?
Q3. You said that you lost money as a result of being a victim of fraud. Which of the following statements, if any, apply to your experience of being a victim of fraud?

Q4. Reflecting on your experience(s) of being defrauded, how did you feel immediately after the incident (i.e., at the time you lost your money, or discovered the person you had been speaking with was not who they said they were)?
